H0.text: Of which US state is Springfield the capital. Massachusetts

H1.text: Of which US state is Springfield the capital. Ohio

H2.text: Of which US state is Springfield the capital. Tennessee

H3.text: Of which US state is Springfield the capital. Ill.

A4.text: Its capital city is Springfield in the center of the state

A5.text: Springfield is the capital city of the U.S. state of Illinois.

A6.text: As the state capital, the government of Illinois is based in Springfield.
